column2: yes. Do it. Go here. Make it happen. Best breakfast I've ever had?! Quite possibly. I ate the parathas burrito
column3: and it was just the most unique and delicious thing I've ever had with some of my favorite ingredients... SO GOOD. My husband ate the kimchee tasty thing
column4: and it was also amazing. My mom ate the special... A house-made goat-meat sausage wrapped in a pancake with their house-made BBQ syrup. Wow. Dad ate the corned beef hash. Delicious all the way around. When I go out to breakfast
column5: I like to have something I can't make at home. This is the PLACE to fulfill my breakfast dreams.
